snippet: While the first two picks in Thursday's NBA draft are essentially locked in, where the drama should start to unfold is pick No. 3....
lead_paragraph: While the first two picks in Thursday's NBA draft are essentially locked in, where the drama should start to unfold is pick No. 3.

headline.main: The Drama of NBA Draft Looks to Begin With No. 3 Pick
